segments.text: I feel like to wear my hair in this way .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , it's really popular these days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think it's suitable for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Honestly speaking , I think the one next to it suits you better .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Even though I really like it , it's just too modern for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's not true . Look over there ! That lady chose the same one and she is surely older than you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay then . And I also want to have my hair colored .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long will it take ? I hope it won't be too long .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope not but it will take at least three hours .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Now it's my son's turn to wait .
segments.speaker: S1
